doc:
Mischa Auer https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mischa_Auer 0 Mischa Auer (born Mikhail Semyonovich Unskovsky (Михаил Семёнович Унсковский), 17 November 1905 – 5 March 1967) was a Russian-born American actor who moved to Hollywood in the late 1920s. He first appeared in film in 1928. Auer had a long career playing in many of the era's best known films. He was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor in 1936 for his performance in the screwball comedy My Man Godfrey, which led to further zany comedy roles. He later moved into television and acted in films again in France and Italy well into the 1960s. Mischa_Auer ( born Mikhail_Semyonovich_Unskovsky ( Михаил_Семёнович_Унсковский ) , 17_November_1905 – 5_March_1967 ) was a_Russian-born_American_actor who moved to Hollywood in the_late_1920s . He first appeared in film in 1928 . Auer had a_long_career_playing in many of the_era 's_best_known_films . He was_nominated for the_Academy_Award for Best Supporting_Actor in 1936 for his_performance in the_screwball_comedy My_Man_Godfrey , which led to further_zany_comedy_roles . He later moved into television and acted in films again in France_and_Italy_well into the_1960s .
